ygData.subject: Re: Please help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... directly ... LOL Oh the stories I could tell of when I DID play. (And yes I am attempting to get back into the game. I just need a few things to go right
ygData.messageBody:
--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "therock521" <jerico521@a...> wrote:
> Hello members, I am doing a research paper on video game addictions
> and I was hoping you could help me with some feedback. What I am
> looking for is the craziest things you ever did that can be
directly
> related to this game. I can tell you I have never played this game,
> but I have a few friends that did, and some of the things they say
> they did was call out from work sick, and play the game seven hours
> in one setting! These are the things I am looking for and my friend
> suggested that if they did it, then there are countless others out
> there that have done even more. I am also looking into how you got
> hooked on playing this game. Did someone lend you a copy? Play it
> over a friend's house? Also, please note that I am not bashing
> anybody here - I am a video game addict myself. I admit I love to
> play them, and spent countless days playing Final Fantasy into the
> early hours of the morning. I hope you guys and girls can help me
> out. Thanks again!
LOL Oh the stories I could tell of when I DID play. (And yes I am
attempting to get back into the game. I just need a few things to go
right for once and then it is on to the crazy things I used to do!)
Let's see...I did stay glued to my comp one night when I was in Maine
for I think it was close to 24 hours. I was trying to get a sub
character up to level 19 so I could teleport and join a group. (Ya he
was a druid who was soon scrapped) Um....I've chosen to play EQ over
going to the movies with my (now ex) boyfriend. I hope this will help
you at least a little. The Raven
